pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, June 29, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Madrid, Spain

Private meetings

8:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in official arrivals at the NATO Summit.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Secretary General of NATO, Jens Stoltenberg.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Denmark, Mette Frederiksen.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend an official welcome ceremony by the Secretary General of NATO, Jens Stoltenberg.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Opening Session of the North Atlantic Council Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of welcoming remarks and host broadcast coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Sweden, Magdalena Andersson.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Finland, Sauli Niinistö.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council Plenary Session.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of welcoming remarks and host broadcast coverage

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Transatlantic Working Dinner, chaired by the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

Closed to media
